data.name: "Fire-and-forget" support for long-running tasks (like emails or AI), featuring a GUI for queue management, parallel processing, and cancellation.
data.value: "Fire-and-forget" support for long-running tasks (like emails or AI), featuring a GUI for queue management, parallel processing, and cancellation.

data.name: A built-in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system for fine-grained permission management.
data.value: A built-in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system for fine-grained permission management.

data.name: A complete solution for user authentication and profile management.
data.value: A complete solution for user authentication and profile management.

data.name: A fully responsive layout that looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.
data.value: A fully responsive layout that looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.

data.name: A modern, feature-rich, and highly extensible foundation for your next web application.
data.value: A modern, feature-rich, and highly extensible foundation for your next web application.

data.name: A simple and reliable metronome to help you keep time.
data.value: A simple and reliable metronome to help you keep time.

data.name: All dependencies are automatically registered and always available via constructor injection.
data.value: All dependencies are automatically registered and always available via constructor injection.

data.name: Calculate major scales and chords based on a root note.
data.value: Calculate major scales and chords based on a root note.

data.name: Calculate minor scales and chords (natural, harmonic, and melodic).
data.value: Calculate minor scales and chords (natural, harmonic, and melodic).

data.name: Calculate musical intervals between two notes.
data.value: Calculate musical intervals between two notes.

data.name: Challenge your musical memory by repeating melodies.
data.value: Challenge your musical memory by repeating melodies.

data.name: Comes with Docker support for simplified and consistent deployments.
data.value: Comes with Docker support for simplified and consistent deployments.

data.name: Develop exclusively in UTC while the system automatically converts and displays dates in the user's local time zone.
data.value: Develop exclusively in UTC while the system automatically converts and displays dates in the user's local time zone.

data.name: Easily switch between database providers, including SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, and an in-memory database for testing.
data.value: Easily switch between database providers, including SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, and an in-memory database for testing.

data.name: Effortlessly write integration tests using in-memory databases, temporary file systems, built-in mocking, and real-world HTTP request simulation.
data.value: Effortlessly write integration tests using in-memory databases, temporary file systems, built-in mocking, and real-world HTTP request simulation.

data.name: Features a built-in file management system with automatic avatar compression and privacy protection.
data.value: Features a built-in file management system with automatic avatar compression and privacy protection.

data.name: Handle recurring jobs like cleanup and synchronization with a comprehensive GUI for monitoring execution history and logs.
data.value: Handle recurring jobs like cleanup and synchronization with a comprehensive GUI for monitoring execution history and logs.

data.name: Includes extensive documentation and practical examples to get you started quickly.
data.value: Includes extensive documentation and practical examples to get you started quickly.

data.name: Keys are not isolated. The 'Circle of Fifths' is music's compass, revealing the order of all key signatures (C -> G -> D...) and their harmonic relationships. It's the core blueprint for composition, arrangement, and improvisation.
data.value: Keys do not exist in isolation. The 'Circle of Fifths' is music's compass, revealing the order of all key signatures (C -> G -> D...) and their harmonic relationships. It is the core blueprint for composition, arrangement, and improvisation.

data.name: Models are validated on both client and server sides based on data annotations.
data.value: Models are validated on both client and server sides based on data annotations.

data.name: Music isn't magic; it's a brilliant combination of math, physics, and patterns. Our tool reveals these patterns:
data.value: Music isn't magic; it's a brilliant combination of maths, physics, and patterns. Our tool reveals these patterns:

data.name: MusicTools provides a collection of essential tools for musicians and students. Explore our calculators and ear training tests to enhance your musical skills.
data.value: MusicTools provides a collection of essential tools for musicians and students. Explore our calculators and ear training tests to enhance your musical skills.

data.name: Seamlessly integrate with any OpenID Connect provider, with automatic role synchronization.
data.value: Seamlessly integrate with any OpenID Connect provider, with automatic role synchronization.

data.name: Smart dark mode that adapts to the user's system settings.
data.value: Smart dark mode that adapts to the user's system settings.

data.name: Supports both environment variables and database-backed settings, with automatic priority given to environment variables for seamless overrides.
data.value: Supports both environment variables and database-backed settings, with automatic priority given to environment variables for seamless overrides.

data.name: Test your ear by identifying musical intervals.
data.value: Test your ear by identifying musical intervals.

data.name: The Magic of the Circle of Fifths
data.value: The Magic of the Circle of Fifths

data.name: The navigation bar automatically adjusts based on user roles and permissions.
data.value: The navigation bar automatically adjusts based on user roles and permissions.

data.name: Theory can be dry, but watching it in action is fun. The core value of this tool is 'real-time synchronization.' When you select a new key, the Chromatic Circle, Circle of Fifths, piano keys, and staff notation update instantly. You'll immediately understand why G Major has only one sharp!
data.value: Music theory can be dry, but watching it in action is brilliant. The core value of this tool is 'real-time synchronisation.' When you select a new key, the Chromatic Circle, Circle of Fifths, piano keys, and staff notation update instantly. You'll immediately understand why G Major has only one sharp!

data.name: This is a template project, where we start the voyager...
data.value: This is a template project, where we start the voyager...

data.name: Welcome to the interactive music theory tool. We help you connect the abstract concepts of music theory—the Chromatic Scale, the Circle of Fifths, and the piano keyboard—allowing you to truly 'see' how music works.
data.value: Welcome to the interactive music theory tool. We help you connect the abstract concepts of music theory—the Chromatic Scale, the Circle of Fifths, and the piano keyboard—allowing you to truly 'see' how music works.

data.name: Whether you are a beginner student, a curious enthusiast, or an experienced producer, this tool will provide an intuitive sandbox for exploring keys, harmony, and scale structures.
data.value: Whether you are a student just starting out, a curious enthusiast, or an experienced producer, this tool provides an intuitive sandbox for exploring keys, harmony, and scale structures.

data.name: Why is an octave divided into 12 keys? Modern music is built on '12-Tone Equal Temperament,' a brilliant mathematical compromise that allows all keys to sound 'acceptable.' Our Chromatic Circle makes this abstract pitch system visually intuitive.
data.value: Why is an octave divided into 12 notes? Modern music is built upon '12-Tone Equal Temperament,' a brilliant mathematical compromise that allows all keys to sound 'acceptable.' Our Chromatic Circle makes this abstract pitch system visually intuitive.

data.name: Why is music designed this way?
data.value: Why is music designed this way?
